Kanboard.description:
Kanboard is a free and open source Kanban project management software.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
Kanboard.more_info: Initial username/password is set up as admin/admin.

80.description: Kanboard HTTP port. You may need to open it on your firewall if you want access from outside your local network.
80.label: HTTP port [e.g. 8080]

/etc/nginx/ssl.description: Share for your SSL certificate (if using one).
/etc/nginx/ssl.label: SSL Certificate Storage [e.g. kan-certs]

/var/www/app/data.description: Share for Kanboard Application data (sqlite database, attachments).
/var/www/app/data.label: Data Storage [e.g. kan-data]
